original_title: Chhota Bheem ki Citi Pitti Gul
overview: Krishna is in his ordinary universe examine when he comes to be familiar with Kaalicharan’s detestable arrangement to open the entryways of Andher Nagari and release Vinaashasur onto the world on Amawaas night. They door is found right beneath the shopping center in Raunak City. Krishna visits Bheem and companions to caution them about his arrangements. He recommends they can stop Kaalicharan by closing the entryways of Andher Nagari forver. He sends them on a journey to observe the way to Andher Nagari which is inside a cavern on Trishul Parvat. Krishna can’t go on this mission or help them due to obscure reasons.
title: Chhota Bheem ki Citi Pitti Gul
